text: Oakley is a populated place in Pitt County, North Carolina, United States. ==Geography== Oakley is located at latitude 35.757937 and longitude -77.2866307. The elevation is 62 feet. ==Demographics== ==References== ==External links== Category:Unincorporated communities in Pitt County, North Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in North Carolina
title: Oakley, Pitt County, North Carolina
